function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of infective diseases between the population","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread leading to a pandemic and high mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to keep the basic reproductive rate (R0) below 1, and monitoring for asymptomatic cases","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing facilities, and monitoring systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and at-risk individuals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and healthcare institutions"}]}
